data.actual_result: The filename of the downloaded image is set as the title of the embed and without file extension.
data.expected_result: The downloaded image should have a correctly formatted name with the appropriate extension (. jpg, . png, . gif, etc)
data.short_description: When downloading an image that is from a bot embed, the filename will take the title of the embed and erases file extension
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a bot that can send an embed with at least a title and an image - Make the bot send the embed - On your Android device, tap on the image and hit Download
